name: mm-drawer
description: Re-usable drawer component for showing/hiding content.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: The expanded state of the drawer. Changing this will open/close the drawer

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the drawer's toggle button. Setting this value will show the "Tab" style drawer

attributes.name: openedLabel
attributes.description: The label for the drawer's toggle button when drawer is opened. Setting both this value will show the "Tab" style drawer

attributes.name: closedLabel
attributes.description: The label for the drawer's toggle button when the drawer is closed. Setting this value will show the "Tab" style drawer

attributes.name: closedHeight
attributes.description: The pixel height of the drawer when closed.

attributes.name: openedHeight
attributes.description: The pixel height of the drawer when opened. Defaults to measured content height.

attributes.name: forceMeasure
attributes.description: Force drawer to measure contents every time it is opened. By default the initial height is cached.
